<ion-side-menus>
  <!-- Center content -->
  <ion-side-menu-content ng-controller="yourController">
  </ion-side-menu-content>

  <!-- Left menu -->
  <ion-side-menu side="left">
  </ion-side-menu>

  <!-- Right menu -->
  <ion-side-menu side="right">
  </ion-side-menu>
</ion-side-menus>
